title: Bengaluru startup offering battery-as-a-service for MG Comet EV, Windsor EV, and ZS EV at just Rs 2.5 per km
description: Vidyut partners with JSW MG Motor India to introduce Battery-as-a-service (BaaS) for select MG electric vehicles. This service allows EV owners to rent batteries, minimizing the high upfront cost and reducing overall running expenses. Customers can choose to continue or buy the battery after the financing tenure. Vidyut aims to make EV ownership affordable and accessible.
